body_html: Tensors on the GPU still store their shapes on the CPU, and reshape already works in that case. The shape will never be stored on the GPU, so I think this should be closed. Presumably you're seeing an error caused by forcing the shape argument onto the GPU; if so there should possibly be a different bug about placer functionality.
body_text: Tensors on the GPU still store their shapes on the CPU, and reshape already works in that case.  The shape will never be stored on the GPU, so I think this should be closed.  Presumably you're seeing an error caused by forcing the shape argument onto the GPU; if so there should possibly be a different bug about placer functionality.
body: Tensors on the GPU still store their shapes on the CPU, and `reshape` already works in that case.  The shape will never be stored on the GPU, so I think this should be closed.  Presumably you're seeing an error caused by forcing the shape argument onto the GPU; if so there should possibly be a different bug about placer functionality.
